item.title: Stellantis reveals redesigned Ram heavy-duty trucks
item.description: Stellantis has redesigned its large Ram heavy-duty trucks, which are expected to arrive at dealers in the first quarter of this year and will start at...

item.title: Trump seeks to block 'imminent' release of special counsel Jack Smith's report
item.description: Trump’s lawyers said they reviewed a two-volume draft copy of Smith’s report over the weekend.

item.title: U.S. records its first human bird flu death
item.description: A patient in Louisiana has died of bird flu. Health authorities considered the case to be the first severe H5N1 infection in a U.S. resident.

item.title: Nvidia releases gaming chips for PCs, tapping AI features from data center GPUs
item.description: At CES in Las Vegas, Nvidia showed that it's still focused on serving gamers even as the company's primary business is now in the data center.

item.title: UFC's Dana White joins Meta's board weeks before Trump takes office
item.description: UFC CEO Dana White, a longtime friend of Donald Trump, is joining the board of Meta two weeks before the new administration begins.
